content:
Maar apreme! Punyanidhe! Sabha sau-bhaagyam
Chollunnu, ninakkekeedum-kartthaavin bhaagyam
/tnashvara vishvam-vittone bhaagyam!
/tnaathhanilimpam-poondone bhaagyam!
Shaashvatha jeevitharaajyangall-vannavakaashikke-
Nneeshan chollunnaa shabdam-kellkkumpoll bhaagyam!
/thaaleluyyaa-nin praarththhana abhayam.

Thevodoro sahadaa than-ormma-dina-tthe
Thiruvishdappadi ghoshippaan-yogyatha nalkenam
/tthal praarththhanayaal-naanaabhaagatthum
/tpaalikkuka de-vaalaya dayaraakall
Ninne sthothram cheytheedaan-thoshaaghoshangall
Nalkuka mashihaa karunaabdhe! Nin krpa keertthippaan
/thaaleluyyaa-neekkuka duà´ƒkhangall.
